taskDescription: Using curved arrows to indicate the electron flow in each step, show how the base-catalyzed reverse-aldol reaction of 4-hydroxy-4-methyl-2-pentanone takes place to yield 2 equivalents of acetone.
detailedSolution: The reverse reaction is the exact opposite of the forward reaction shown in Figure 23.2.
